Burning Hammer: I don't really....want to go anywhere.

Evil Burning Hammer=
 telepathically to good one: We're going to hell, you idiot! We're going to=
 kill everyone here!

Burning Hammer: I'm having a bit of head trouble righ=
t now, get me someplace, like lock me up or something, because I'm about to=
 kill someone. Don't say I won't, because I won't kill you and you know it.=


Evil Burning Hammer telepathically to good: You are not going to lock you=
rself up, you are going to find a victim, and you are going to follow my st=
ep by step--

Burning Hammer: Get away from me!

He backs up against a wall=
.

Burning Hammer: I'm not quite right, and anytime now I may suddenly reve=
rt to my old self, Lambda...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rudra=
656@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, October 11, 20=
01 7:31 AM
  Subject: Re: Finally, the Gunslinger, has come back! To NBW...=



  ::Lambda::
       "Uh oh.  You've regained your memory haven't you?"  =
She looks at the floor then back up at him.  "So who do we kill and where d=
o we go?"
